title: Can we talk about these new Papercraft skins?
body:
So, on the PBE, there are 2 new skins for Nunu and Anivia.......and they're something else.

https://youtu.be/JWsNjx1YdpQ

https://youtu.be/9jvPJj0JcDI

These. Are. Gorgeous. 

I'm just sad that I don't play either of them.

If you're someone who plays either of these champs, you guys are lucking out in 9.4. Riot really knocked it out the park with these.

~~Btw, Riot, if you haven't thought of it (which I'm already sure you have) these skins are perfect for different chromas.......I expect to see a ton of them on the PBE here soon.~~

EDIT: As expected, there are already 8 chromas for each on the PBE.

replies.body: <3 <3 ;____________; thank you so much for the kind words!
Please continue to make wonderful works like these, you're my favorite Rioter from now on!

You guys deserve it, These are really great! Similar to OP I'm just sad that none of my mains got one lol. 

~~By the By if you guys were looking for other Papercraft champs I just want to Elect Bard KthxBai~~

> [{quoted}](name=semipriceysoap,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=P3LEUui4,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2019-02-05T22:03:06.275+0000)
>
> <3 <3 ;____________; thank you so much for the kind words!

Not sure if you know anything about the skin lore, but are these skins connected to Bladecraft Orianna? Or even Workshop Shaco?

> [{quoted}](name=semipriceysoap,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=P3LEUui4,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2019-02-05T22:03:06.275+0000)
>
> <3 <3 ;____________; thank you so much for the kind words!

Yo you guys in the art department are so fucking talented it's amazing!

I wish that everyone in the marketing department cared like y'all do.

> [{quoted}](name=semipriceysoap,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=P3LEUui4,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2019-02-05T22:03:06.275+0000)
>
> <3 <3 ;____________; thank you so much for the kind words!

Can you please make a skin for Taric , i think you are the right person to make one for him !{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

This skins give me big MediaMolecule game vibes and I LOVE IT 

{{sticker:sg-jinx}}

I'm really excited for this skin line. It's super diverse and has a lot of potential. It walks that fine line between "cool" and "whimsical" so virtually any champion could get a skin from it. 

{{champion:432}} {{champion:420}} {{champion:427}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:516}} {{champion:142}} {{champion:498}} {{champion:497}} {{champion:136}} {{champion:60}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:15}} {{champion:4}} {{champion:238}} would make some AWESOME Papercraft skins.
{{champion:9}} too imo
Damn, the sound effects for these sound amazing, too bad I don't really play either of them if I did would definitely get them.
<3 <3 Thank you! so glad you like them! The Anivia sound designer and I had some fun with the paper haha!
I can just imagine u guys in the studio, throwing paper around and such XD
I finally recycled them away but I had a literal pile of different kinds of papers & cardboard in my room for months! xD
Personally they're not my cup of tea but I'm happy they exist, since its incredibly creative and unique. I'm glad this is one of their skins experimentation in 2019
Me too, I'm just sad that I'm probably going to have to wait another 3 years to get a skin I like for Anivia or Nunu.
They are not really my cup of tea. They are definitely well made though and some of those Anivia effects like the book tornado for the R makes me really want different elemental skins for her.

Personally, I think this is another fail on RIot’s part. The idea of this skin line isn’t bad....but you seem to pick champions that don’t fit the idea as well as others. When I saw this post I immediately thought of Kayle. I just hope you guys can really dive into which skins work best for each champion. I cringe to think about anivia and nunu mains that have to wait years to get a skin they actually like. This may not be as bad as the high noon Urgot, but I am definitely reminded of that when I look at these skins.
I compare it more to the Mecha Aurelion skin that came out. Now I understand their pain.

>Papercraft Anivia is a fail, Kayle is a much better fit

Have you ever heard of origami?
I've heard of origami birds, not origami angels.

And why'd you thought Kayle was a much better fit?
Because you saw Konan from Naruto Shippudden use her paper jutsu and she gets a pair of wings? You do know Kayle is very much a completed rework at this point in time, i don't think she's a good fit for the theme.

Anivia and Nunu have been neglected in terms of skins for quite a while, it's nice to see these champions get some new garbs for their mains and such.

>This may not be as bad as the high noon Urgot, but I am definitely reminded of that when I look at these skins.

Do you know that people meme about Star Guardian Urgot, for quite a while now? At this point, i do consider it just a meme but some people might be serious about it. I personally don't think it's a good fit but that doesn't stop people from asking for it.
These skins are so cool!! If I actually played Nunu or Anivia, I'd buy this, but for now I'll just buy them with BE on PBE

These skins look amazing. I LOVE Anivia. Does anyone know how much the bundle will be with the chromas? I want to know how much to shell out for these beauties, haha <3 {{champion:34}} is so worth it.
Anivia's one is really awesome. Something original and interesting!

I think Riot don't know that {{champion:26}} and {{champion:72}} are champions aswell.
But skins are great.

Kinda makes me wish Jhin got one of these, but he's getting a legendary later on, so.
Still, it would be nice to have another skin for Jhin this year in case the legendary is disappointing(unmasked, no Quinton Flynn kind of disappointing).

I do like these, though. Not going to buy them due to my Jhin content only policy, but hopefully I'll get them from a chest someday. I am also looking forward to more from this skinline.

> [{quoted}](name=4 Step Cadence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=P3LEUui4,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2019-02-06T01:55:19.380+0000)
>
> Kinda makes me wish Jhin got one of these, but he's getting a legendary later on, so.
> Still, it would be nice to have another skin for Jhin this year in case the legendary is disappointing(unmasked, no Quinton Flynn kind of disappointing).
> 
> I do like these, though. Not going to buy them due to my Jhin content only policy, but hopefully I'll get them from a chest someday. I am also looking forward to more from this skinline.

Jhin only policy. lol
when epic skins for anivia outclass her legendary skin
Hey atleast Anivia is getting something more than a VGU update her last skin was almost 2 years ago.
Yeah and now we'll have to wait another 2 years for a skin we actually like.

> [{quoted}](name=Rathar Dashing,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=P3LEUui4,comment-id=00170000,timestamp=2019-02-06T21:13:58.878+0000)
>
> Yeah and now we'll have to wait another 2 years for a skin we actually like.

So you're saying everyone is obligated to hate every skin that they shouldn't like and should like every other good looking skin? Are we all just being controlled by a hive mind.

Uhh, wtf are you talking about?
I'm saying that you shouldn't be obligated to like a skin just because it's something new for your champion. That has nothing to do with a hive mind, it's the opposite.
Surprisingly enough, there are people out there who don't like the Anivia skin, and it sucks for them because it's the only chance they'll get at an Anivia skin for quite some time.

> [{quoted}](name=Rathar Dashing,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=P3LEUui4,comment-id=0017000000000000,timestamp=2019-02-07T14:50:15.616+0000)
>
> Uhh, wtf are you talking about?
> I'm saying that you shouldn't be obligated to like a skin just because it's something new for your champion. That has nothing to do with a hive mind, it's the opposite.
> Surprisingly enough, there are people out there who don't like the Anivia skin, and it sucks for them because it's the only chance they'll get at an Anivia skin for quite some time.

''WE actually like''.
"We" as in the people who don't like the skin, duh.
This is one of my favorite skin lines they have ever done! Bummer there is only 2, and I don’t play these champs much.
i have to say these are the weirdest skins yet.

Ah, them gregarious paper crafts.

The under-celebrated art (in the global scale) that originated in China. So much so the country of origin doesn't even get a mention in the paper craft's English wikipedia page last time I checked.

But it's awesome that people are taking notice of this art, though.
You should try those skin design on {{champion:421}} and {{champion:136}}. It is a quite interesting design overall.
I am absolutely over the moon with the result of Nunu & Willump's first new skin I LOVE this
i would love the anivia one but i have my two favorite nunu skins already so :(

They sure did! I only play Nunu every now and then, but damn, these came out great. Love what they did for Anivia as well, that is one of her best skins in awhile. I really hope they expand upon it in the future, there's a lot of others I could see in this theme.   Also love the icons they made for them, and cannot wait for the Splash/es.
It's a really unique idea, and it's honestly adorable.
I like them a lot! I think they are very well done, and the Nunu one's particles are so cute!
Yea as soon as I saw these skins my jaw dropped their so elegant! Amazing work, ya'll <3
Personally as a Quinn player , I'm again disapointed.
Don't support Riot. Lovely art on these skins, but as long as the game is broken, spend your cash elsewhere.
Good skins but I wouldn't want them for my mains.
